comment._content: Same period - more or less- different country: www.flickr.com/photos/enjoy-the-silence/2235765875/in/set...

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: The brown leather cash collection bags carried by some of the conductors in the picture held a flip top paper ticket holder that can be seen sitting in the front pouch. These were still used by government bus conductors in the 1970's.
